author: bridge-bot
content:
<adietrichs> RollCall breakout in ~19 hours:

I'll be giving a presentation on our view on the paths forward for L2 EVM equivalence, and the next phase of RollCall.
Should be a good one, looking forward to seeing you tomorrow!

Info:
- Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1171
- October 23, 14:00 UTC
- Zoom link posted here just before the call
